resources.string: You are welcome to Osun State University Health Centre. We provide Health Services to students and Staff in all the six campuses of the Institution.
Osun State University Health Care Centre is the Medical Centre in the University which provides medical services to student in school, staff and Health Attendant.

The University health services department was established to cater for the overall health needs of the students, staff of the university. The clinic is located in the Campus and provided a comprehensive health care covering both the curative and preventive medicine.
The following sections are fully staffed and equipped for optimal functions of the clinic.
